title: Self-employed
descr: Full-stack web application development, testing, and maintenance using Sql Server, C# / .NET 5 (WebAPI), and ReactJS. Wordpress administration and maintenance. VB.NET desktop application maintenance. MS Access database migration (from MS Access to Sql Server). Git / Gitlab project management.

title: Software Developer Intern
descr: Completed necessary changes to ARG's purchasing management system (VB.NET, ASP.NET). Made changes to ARG's Wordpress-based contractor safety exam website. Created a simple but effective web app to track the I.T. department's assets using Sql Server, C# / .NET Core 3.1 (WebAPI), and ReactJS.

title: Quality Assurance Intern
descr: Completed quality testing and logged testing data using in-house software.

title: Shift Lead
descr: Managed store as a single employee during assigned shift, assisted customers with shopping requirements. Balanced drawer and kept track of store inventory.
